question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. white sign says "feet"
B. red triangular sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The red triangular sign is positioned further back on the road, behind the yellow truck and the white "feet" sign, which is mounted on the bridge near the camera, making its depth relationship clearly discernible without a depth map.
